text:
Hello all,
I am trying to edit the HTML of the email subscription preferences page to no avail. I initially tried to copy the system template for email subscription preferences '<@UDA553DRD>/elevate/templates/system/email-subscription-preferences.hubl.html' and it wouldn't let me edit it after I made the copy. Can anyone help me do this correctly, I keep getting this error and none of the information in the Developer Docs is helping.
